overview.summary: Structural, civil, and MEP engineering partner delivering end-to-end design, analysis, and construction support.

services.name: Structural Engineering
services.description: Concept-to-detail design, finite element analysis, and peer review.

services.name: Civil & Site Development
services.description: Drainage, grading, pavements, utilities, and environmental coordination.

services.name: MEP Systems
services.description: Mechanical, electrical, and plumbing design with energy modeling.

services.name: Project Management
services.description: Scope, schedule, and cost controls with construction-phase support.

testimonials.name: Ma. Clarissa Reyes
testimonials.quote: They guided our two-story family home and pool design with clear drawings and practical revisions that kept us on budget.

testimonials.name: Anton Miguel Santos
testimonials.quote: Our three-story townhouse project moved smoothly because the structural checks and site coordination were meticulous.

testimonials.name: Lourdes Bautista
testimonials.quote: From a small piggery upgrade to a compact equipment shed, their team delivered resilient plans with realistic timelines.

testimonials.name: Rafael Dominguez
testimonials.quote: Their structural notes and site checks made our two-story rental units and small pool feel solid and well-coordinated.

seo.description: Twin Building Engineering delivers structural, civil, and MEP services for resilient, efficient buildings across the Philippines.
